title: Where to buy decrotive boxes online?
content:
Hey Everyone,

We are currently in the process of getting some media kits made - however in the mean time we have a few mailings to get out the door. Since the media kits won’t be here in time we want to just buy around 25-50 nice boxes online for a temporary solution. Does anyone know where to buy a “cool” box online?

Thanks!  
Mike
